original_title: Raid Amazones 2023 continues to unravel with SriLankan Airlines
original_body_lines: The French women’s itinerant adventure trail ‘Raid Amazones 2023’ sponsored by SriLankan Airlines, is in progress in Kandy. The participants spent the morning of 23 March canoeing across Lake Victoria. The group will continue their adventure this morning (24 March) biking and running an 18-kilometer trail from Rideegama to Delvita.

The thrill of adventure is not the only lure of the event. Every adventure-packed morning of the trail is followed by an equally riveting evening for the participants as they get to explore local culture through food, sport and recreation.
